Structs/Baseline.html.name: Baseline
Structs/Baseline.html.abstract: Set of constraints related to baseline of restrictive rect

Structs/Center.html.name: Center
Structs/Center.html.abstract: Set of constraints related to center of restrictive rect

Structs/Bottom.html.name: Bottom
Structs/Bottom.html.abstract: Set of constraints related to bottom of restrictive rect

Structs/Right.html.name: Right
Structs/Right.html.abstract: Set of constraints related to right of restrictive rect

Structs/Left.html.name: Left
Structs/Left.html.abstract: Set of constraints related to left of restrictive rect

Structs/Top.html.name: Top
Structs/Top.html.abstract: Set of constraints related to top of restrictive rect

Structs/Layout.html.name: Layout
Structs/Layout.html.abstract: Main layout structure. Use his for positioning and filling in source rect (which can be constrained using RectBasedConstraint constraints).

Structs/LayoutScheme.html.name: LayoutScheme
Structs/LayoutScheme.html.abstract: LayoutScheme defines layout process for some layout blocks.

Structs/LayoutConstraint.html.name: LayoutConstraint
Structs/LayoutConstraint.html.abstract: Simple related constraint. Contains anchor constraints and layout element as source of frame for constrain

Structs/AdjustLayoutConstraint.html.name: AdjustLayoutConstraint
Structs/AdjustLayoutConstraint.html.abstract: Related constraint for adjust size of source space. Contains size constraints and layout element for calculate size.

Structs/ContentLayoutConstraint.html.name: ContentLayoutConstraint
Structs/ContentLayoutConstraint.html.abstract: Related constraint that uses internal bounds to constrain, defined in ‘layoutBounds’ property

Structs/AnonymConstraint.html.name: AnonymConstraint
Structs/AnonymConstraint.html.abstract: Layout constraint for independent changing source space. Use him with anchors that not describes rect side (for example LayoutAnchor.insets or LayoutAnchor.Size).

Structs/ScrollDirection.html.name: ScrollDirection
Structs/ScrollDirection.html.abstract: Defines limiters for content of scroll layout guide.

Protocols/LayoutConstraintProtocol.html#.name: isActive
Protocols/LayoutConstraintProtocol.html#.abstract: Flag, defines that constraint may be used for layout

Protocols/LayoutConstraintProtocol.html#.name: isIndependent
Protocols/LayoutConstraintProtocol.html#.abstract: Flag that constraint not required other calculations. It`s true for size-based constraints.

Protocols/LayoutConstraintProtocol.html#.name: convert(rectIfNeeded:to:)
Protocols/LayoutConstraintProtocol.html#.abstract: Converts rect from constraint coordinate space to destination coordinate space if needed.

Protocols/LayoutConstraintProtocol.html#.name: active(_:)
Protocols/LayoutConstraintProtocol.html#.abstract: Returns constraint with possibility to change active state

Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.name: isActive
Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.abstract: Flag, defines that block will be used for layout

Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.name: layout(in:)
Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.abstract: Calculate and apply frames layout items in custom space.

Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.name: snapshot(for:)
Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.abstract: Returns snapshot for all LayoutElement items in block. Attention: in during calculating snapshot frames of layout items must not changed.

Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.name: snapshot(for:completedRects:)
Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.abstract: Returns snapshot for all LayoutElement items in block. Does not call this method directly outside LayoutBlockProtocol object.

Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.name: apply(snapshot:)
Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.abstract: Applying frames from snapshot to LayoutElement items in this block.

Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.name: snapshot(for:constrainRects:)
Protocols/LayoutBlockProtocol.html#/s:8C.abstract: Returns snapshot for all LayoutElement items in block.

Protocols/LayoutSnapshotProtocol.html#/s.name: snapshotFrame
Protocols/LayoutSnapshotProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Frame of layout block represented as snapshot

Protocols/AdjustableLayoutElement.html#/.name: contentConstraint
Protocols/AdjustableLayoutElement.html#/.abstract: Constraint, that defines content size of element

Protocols/AdjustableLayoutElement.html#/.name: adjustLayoutConstraint(for:)
Protocols/AdjustableLayoutElement.html#/.abstract: Convenience getter for adjust constraint related to this element

Protocols/AdaptiveLayoutElement.html#/s:.name: sizeThatFits(_:)
Protocols/AdaptiveLayoutElement.html#/s:.abstract: Asks the layout element to calculate and return the size that best fits the specified size

Protocols/TextPresentedElement.html#/s:8.name: baselinePosition
Protocols/TextPresentedElement.html#/s:8.abstract: Defines y-position from origin in internal coordinate space

Protocols/ElementInLayoutTime.html#/s:8C.name: superElement
Protocols/ElementInLayoutTime.html#/s:8C.abstract: Layout element that maintains this layout entity

Protocols/LayoutElement.html#/s:8CGLayou.name: frame
Protocols/LayoutElement.html#/s:8CGLayou.abstract: External representation of layout entity in coordinate space

Protocols/LayoutElement.html#/s:8CGLayou.name: superElement
Protocols/LayoutElement.html#/s:8CGLayou.abstract: Layout element that maintains this layout entity

Protocols/LayoutElement.html#/s:8CGLayou.name: inLayoutTime
Protocols/LayoutElement.html#/s:8CGLayou.abstract: Entity that represents element in layout time
